channel.title: Is there any way to run my server while useing a Router?
channel.description: My brother visits every month and hooks up the router so the internet and Xbox can be played at the same time. My question is, is there anyway to make it so people can connect to an IP on a wireless router? Please help, Thanks.

item.title: Is there any way to run my server while useing a Router?

item.description:
@Fatal_Desire wrote:

Dont make 4+ post on same thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Is there any way to run my server while useing a Router?
item.dc:creator: @crimsonbow13 crimsonbow13
item.description:
@crimsonbow13 wrote:

I think you guys misunderstood. I’m not ‘on’ wireless internet or anything. But the computer that I [color=red]am on is hooked up to the router. To give off the signal to the xbox and my other laptop.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there any way to run my server while useing a Router?

item.title: Is there any way to run my server while useing a Router?
item.dc:creator: @xPetrix xPetrix
item.description:
@xPetrix wrote:

I am wireless and my server runs perfectly fine. Just make sure you portforward correctly.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there any way to run my server while useing a Router?

item.title: Is there any way to run my server while useing a Router?
item.dc:creator: @aqzazq aqzazq
item.description:
@aqzazq wrote:

Well i run wirless, The thing about wireless, your ip changes. Rather than wired internet where your ip stays the same. When you go wireless just go to your cmd and type “ipconfig”. If the ip changed then just go to the portforward site, and type the last 3 numbers of your ip. BUT ONLY IF IT CHANGED WHEN YOU UNPLUGED THE WIRED INTERNET FROM THE COMPUTER.

-aqzazq

Read full topic
item.source: Is there any way to run my server while useing a Router?

item.title: Is there any way to run my server while useing a Router?
item.dc:creator: @The_Chubby_Bunny The Chubby Bunny
item.description:
@The_Chubby_Bunny wrote:

cj_howat@hotmail.com:

Hey man, want the best way to run your server?, if you have a router, Go download utorrent then go to options, and it will show you the port it used, change that to 43594 and then save restart computer and ur server should work

You should be a salesman

Read full topic

item.title: Is there any way to run my server while useing a Router?
item.dc:creator: @issac issac
item.description:
@issac wrote:

well for mine i had to connect my computer straight to my router enable to portforward. and it worked fine. but i could not get it to portforward right with my wireless. so i would say just hook straight into you router with an Ethernet cable
